text: Xerardo Fernández Albor (7 September 1917 – 12 July 2018) was a Spanish physician. He serves as President of the autonomous community of Galicia from 1982 to 1987. He lost a motion of no confidence in 1987. He was a member of the People's Party. Albor died in Santiago de Compostela on 12 July 2018, at the age of 100.Muere a los 100 años Gerardo Fernández Albor, primer presidente autonómico de Galicia Muere Gerardo Fernández Albor a los cien años de edad ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Presidents of the Regional Government of Galicia Category:Spanish centenarians Category:Spanish physicians
title: Gerardo Fernández Albor
